title: Ep.10 Jack Rooke
itunes:title: Ep.10 Jack Rooke
itunes:subtitle: Cariad talks to comedian and documentary maker Jack Rooke.
description:
Cariad talks to comedian and documentary maker Jack Rooke (Good Grief, BBC3's Happy Man, Happy Hour) about his Dad's death from cancer and his friend's suicide. As ever they discuss grief, teenagers and having the anger.


You can tweet the show @thegriefcast, follow us on instagram @thegriefcast or email us thegriefcast@gmail.com because you are not alone.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
